column1: #China’s Consulate-General in #Erbil, #Kurdistan Region of #Iraq posted this picture saying: “We thank you from the heart for your sympathy and support with the Chinese people, such photos will remain engraved in our memories forever.” #Coronavirus #CoronaVirusUpdates #COVID19

RT @GoranShakhawan: A nurse in a hospital in Erbil - #Kurdistan sings to a child infected with #COVID19.
